page.title: 16An 11 Year Old's School Day
page.content: The alarm wakes me at 7:30.I wash, dress and go downstairs.My breakfast is cornflakes,toast and tea or orange juice.I put my plastic lunchbox and plimsolls in my bag,and put on my coat while mum gets the car out to take me to school.When she drops me I cross the road with the "Green Man"and meet my friends.We talk about last night's T.V.until a teacher calls us in at 8:55.I hang up my coat,change my shoes and go up to class.After register we have maths and English until we go out to play at 10:45.At 11 watch a schools T.V.programme.At 12 I eat my lunch in the canteen.We play on the field if it is fine,or we may have a club meeting with a teacher.Lessons restart at 1:15 -perhaps music,art or games.At 3:30 I go home.I watch T.V.then cycle to my friend's house.We ride round till I go home for dinner.I go to bed at 9:30.
